parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True sets the reverse offset setting in the forward direction, false sets it in the reverse direction

parameters.name: RevOffset
parameters.description: True enables the reverse offset setting, false disables it

title: ISurfExtrudeFeatureData.SetReverseOffset
description: Sets the reverse offset direction setting for the end condition of this extruded surface.
signature:
void SetReverseOffset( 
   System.Boolean
Fwd
,
   System.Boolean
RevOffset
)

parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True sets the reverse offset setting in the forward direction, false sets it in the reverse direction

parameters.name: RevOffset
parameters.description: True enables the reverse offset setting, false disables it

remarks:
